name: HubSpot Development Team Blog
description: The HubSpot dev team blog is where we riff about topics of interest to us.
rss_item_footer: Want to join the HubSpot dev team?  Check out our jobs.
post_html_head:
<meta name="verify-v1" content="xbeB21cGkorGZrhb+m9jZ1A5EzqvmTulCKArOHsreUA=" >
<meta name="twitter:card" content="summary">
<meta name="twitter:site" content="@hubspotdev">
<meta name="twitter:domain" content="http://dev.hubspot.com/">
<meta name="twitter:app:name:iphone" content="HubSpot">
html_footer:
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
    (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
    m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
    })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-45159009-1', 'hubspot.com');
    ga('send', 'pageview');
            
    ga('create', 'UA-1990066-25', 'hubspot.com', {'name': 'legacyBlogAccount'});
    ga('legacyBlogAccount.send', 'pageview');
 
    if (window.FB){
      FB.Event.subscribe('edge.create', function(targetUrl) {
        ga('send', 'social', 'facebook', 'like', targetUrl);
      });
    }
    if (window.twttr){
      twttr.ready(function (twttr) {
        var logTwitterEvent = function(event){
          if (event && event.type){
            ga('send', 'social', 'twitter', event.type, document.location.toString());
          }
        }

        twttr.events.bind('click', logTwitterEvent);
        twttr.events.bind('tweet', logTwitterEvent);
        twttr.events.bind('follow', logTwitterEvent);
      });
    }
</script>
